name: Ballz (itch) (jael137)
description:
Hit the colored balls with the white ball to start a chain reaction. Try to get as many colored balls in the holes as possible, but don't put the white ball in a hole, or it's game over. Shoot the white ball with left mouse click.

Press R to restart. Due to time constraints there is no music, high score and instructions in the game.

Made in the last 4 hours of the Waltzing Game Jam 3 by Jael137
